SynapsesÂ¶

The synapses module replaces the brian2.Synapses objects. It contains preset classes with pre-filled information, as well as automatic full connectivity.

Available synapses

  • SimpleSynapses class
  • BasicSTDPSynapses class
  • ZengSTDPSynapses class
